explanation: The stage direction describes the physical setting and layout of the scene, including details about the furniture and decor (a bed and a desk, various chairs, and an acoustic tube hanging on the wall). This matches the definition of 'setting', which involves stage description or play location.
stgdir: La plus belle chambre du repaire des brigands klephtes. - Luxe à volonté. Accessoires indispensables : un lit et un secrétaire quelconques. Une panoplie et quelques siéges. - Au mur pend un tube acoustique.
